direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve historical data related to loan operations but focus on different aspects (repayment vs. borrowing).
Both methods access and retrieve loan-related data, though for different states (ongoing vs. historical).
Both methods involve fetching historical data with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods handle repayment history but differ in the type of loan (flexible vs. standard).
